Hozier uses the word "power" 50 times in 'Nina Cried Power', a song lasting 3 minutes and 45 seconds.
Bono only sings "New Year's Day", in the song of that title, a mere 6 times over a period of 5 minutes and 36 seconds.

New issue of @totallydublin is yet another enjoyable read brimming with loads of great features. I reviewed wonderful albums by two spectacular Irish artists, @wearevillagers and @Saint_Sister_ for this one. Pick up a copy around town! https://t.co/W5E8sEyUHH

Carole King had her doorbell modified to chime the melody of 'Will You Still Love Me Tomorrow'. Excellent banter.

Reading Carole King's memoir and have learned two unbelievable things, within 3 pages. 1) King collaborated with Maurice Sendak on an album in 1974. 2) Little Eva babysat King's two daughters. https://t.co/M3JCxlp1lX

Beck and OutKast are now eligible to be inducted into the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame. It's weird when artists from your childhood reach this kind of legendary status while I still panic at the thought of ordering a pizza over the phone.
